tokenSystem.description: Tokens are the platform's internal currency. One balance is used for coach requests, Instant AI plans, and live session bookings. Tokens do not expire.
tokenSystem.vatNote: Displayed prices include 20% VAT where applicable; token calculations use net amounts.

tokenPackages.description: Preset packs and custom load. Prices are in EUR base; converted to GBP/USD for display.
tokenPackages.customLoad: Users can enter a custom amount (Custom Load). Tokens are calculated from the selected currency and rounded to nearest 10.

aiTrainingPlanGenerator.name: Instant AI
aiTrainingPlanGenerator.description: AI-generated fitness plans in minutes. User selects options, can preview first, then publish full plan.

costs.publish: Variable: base formula (400 + weeks×120 + sessionsPerWeek×weeks×8) × 1.3, plus add-ons for injury-safe (+120×1.3), special equipment (+80×1.3), nutrition tips (+100×1.3), PDF (60×1.3 or illustrated with images), workout types (+15×1.3 per type), target muscles (+8×1.3 per muscle). Minimum 0.

steps: Choose training inputs (weeks, sessions, workout types, muscles, etc.)
Publish your full plan (token cost shown before confirm)

coachCoursePricing.description: Coach-built personalized plans. User submits a request (goal, level, training type, equipment, days per week). Cost is calculated from a base plus add-ons.
coachCoursePricing.formula: Base 10,000 tokens + level add + training type add + equipment add + days per week add
coachCoursePricing.delivery: Coach courses are prepared by the coach; typically available for download after processing (e.g. within a few hours). Status: pending → processing → done (or failed).

coachLiveSessionPricing.description: Book a live training session with a coach. Flat rate for all coaches.
coachLiveSessionPricing.slotHours: 08:00–20:00, 1-hour increments; last start time depends on duration (e.g. 3h session must start by 17:00).

howItWorks.summary: Two main paths: Coach-built request (personalized by a coach) or Instant AI plan (generated in minutes). Both use the same token balance.
howItWorks.accountRequired: Browsing does not require an account. Sign-in is required to generate plans, purchase tokens, and access the dashboard.

refunds.title: Refund & Returns Policy
refunds.summary: Monetary refunds for token packages: full refund within 14 days if no tokens from that package were used. Partially used packages are not eligible for partial refund. Processing fee (3–5%) may apply. AI-generated courses: non-refundable once generation started. Trainer courses: token reversal possible if cancelled while status is Pending; no refund once in progress or delivered. Corrupted/non-delivered files: contact within 48 hours for replacement or token refund. Refunds to original payment method (Visa/Mastercard); 5–10 business days. Chargebacks without contacting support first result in account suspension.

faq.question: How fast will I receive a coach course?
faq.answer: Coach courses are delivered by your coach. Delivery time depends on your coach's schedule and course complexity.

faq.question: What's the difference between Coach Course and Instant AI?
faq.answer: Coach Course is delivered by your coach with personalized expertise. Instant AI is generated in minutes.

faq.question: Can I get a refund?
faq.answer: Refund eligibility depends on your order status and delivery stage. Please read our Refund Policy.

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
How do tokens work?
faq.answer: 100 tokens = €1.00 / £0.87 / $1.19. You spend tokens when requesting coach courses or generating instant AI courses.

faq.question: Is it safe?
faq.answer: We include injury-safe options and alternatives, but this is not medical advice. Consult a healthcare professional before starting.

faq.question: What equipment do I need?
faq.answer: Most workouts can be done with minimal equipment. We provide alternatives for different setups.

faq.question: How often should I train?
faq.answer: We recommend 3–4 sessions per week for optimal results, but you can adjust based on your schedule and goals.

faq.question: Do I need an account?
faq.answer: You can browse pages without an account. You'll need to sign in to generate, purchase tokens, and access your dashboard.

faq.question: What are tokens?
faq.answer: Tokens are your balance used across features like previews, publishing, and coach requests.

faq.question: What happens if I don't have enough tokens?
faq.answer: You'll be prompted to top up before completing the action.

faq.question: Is payment secure?
faq.answer: Yes. Payments are processed via secure checkout. We do not store your full card details.

faq.question: Where can I see my token balance?
faq.answer: In your dashboard after signing in.

faq.question: Where do I find my plans?
faq.answer: Your dashboard contains your generated plans and coach requests.

faq.question: Is this medical advice?
faq.answer: No. Training guidance is informational and not a substitute for licensed medical care.

faq.question: Is this suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes. Choose beginner options, start conservatively, and progress gradually.

disclaimers.training: Training guidance is informational and not a substitute for licensed medical care. Consult a healthcare professional before starting any new exercise program.
disclaimers.results: We do not guarantee specific physical results (e.g., weight loss, muscle gain). Dissatisfaction with difficulty, style, or effectiveness of a plan is not valid grounds for a refund.
